# The databases

::::::: columns
::: {.column .incremental width="25%"}
**STOCK DATABASE**

-   All unified data
-   Data from models etc.
-   Validation from ICES
-   Hosting discussions
:::

::: {.column .incremental width="25%"}
**Group and individual METRICS DATABASE** - Benefiting from the WGEEL DB, using similar vocab (series + sampling) - There is already a mapping by ICES of the data structure
:::

::: {.column .incremental width="25%"}
**HABITAT DATABASE** - Not a db: Vocabulary - Other databases are using this
:::

::: {.column .incremental width="25%"}
**ELECTROFISHING DATABASE and OBSTACLES DATABASE**

-   Link to Habitat database
-   Freshwater data
-   Schemas in DIASPARA
:::
:::::::

# Group and individual metric DB

-   DIASPARA WP2 data collection.

-   Based on our analysis of the three DB's: a common database structure for all species is possible

-   This structure will work on the same referential structure.

![Excel file for the DB](images\Viktor.png "An excel template to import data to WP2")


## Habitat DB

-   Format : Geoparquet, Postgis schema
-   Hydroatlas. Version 2 is coming!
-   EU-Hydro different information but smaller coverage
-   The idea is to have access to both
-   Several releases (ZENODO)
